25.text: First in the spotlight tonight is Chris Yates,

28.text: a scientist from London, and he's answering questions

32.text: Sarah Greenan is a barrister from Leeds.

35.text: Her specialist subject - Wainwright's Coast to Coast Walk.

39.text: Bruce Horton, a teacher from Kent, is answering questions

42.text: on the American football team the Green Bay Packers.

45.text: Ewan Payton is a barrister from Bristol.

48.text: His subject - the band Jethro Tull.

52.text: And Simon Alvey, a PR consultant from London.

76.text: Five contenders tonight, because this is a semifinal.

84.text: but they can't rest on their laurels,

86.text: because only one of them will leave here tonight knowing

89.text: they are still on course to become the nation's Mastermind.

91.text: Slightly different rules for the semifinal.

94.text: It's a minute and a half for their specialist subject,

97.text: and then two minutes as usual for general knowledge.

99.text: So let's get on with it and ask our first contender to join us, please.
